sectionText: A Whole New Way To Shop Beauty
services: Just answer our form on what products should we bring to your house
Select a time, date and we will follow to fix an appointment
Our beauty crew will come over with a whole bunch of beauty products which you can try IRL.
Select the products you like and make cash / cashless payment. You are ready for your takeoff!
servicesText: WHY CALL THE BEAUTY CREW HOME
servicesPoints: See makeup & skincare products IRL before buying
Find the exact shades you love
Save yourself the hassle of dealing with returns
crewText: Our beauty crew is like in store assistant who can answer all your questions aot how to use a product, help you find the right product based on your influences looks
brandsDescription: Go ahead book a visit with Truffll beauty crew today
